A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I love the original trilogy and also enjoyed Rogue One. I even appreciate some elements of the prequel trilogy. While I generally disliked The Force Awakens\, I hoped that its follow-up movie\, The Last Jedi\, would redeem it somewhat. Unfortunately my hope was in vain. The Last Jedi is full of plot holes\, discontinuities from previous movies\, and all-in-all just doesn't feel like a Star Wars movie. There's a lot of hate going around for those that don't like this movie\, like we have an agenda to hate everything new or something\, but if anyone has an agenda I would say it's the writers and producers of this film that have hijacked a wonderful film saga and cheapened it into a collection of poor writing\, lame humor and force-fed social commentary.
